mmgenome
  • Reference

Generates a ggplot2 style pairs plot

Generates a ggplot2 style pairs plot.

mmplot_pairs(data, variables)

Arguments

data

(required) The dataframe to plot.
variables

(required) The vaiables to plot as a vector.
color

Coloring of the plot (default: gc).
log.color

Log scale the color (default: F).
log

A vector of variables to log scale.
minlength

Minimum length of the plotted scaffolds.
resize

Rescale the size of the scaffolds (default: 1).
textsize

Size of the legend text (deafult = 8).
point.size

Use a fixed size for points instead of scaffold length.
highlight

Mark selected scaffolds on the plot. Either as a vector of scaffold names or as a full subset of data.
hightlight.color

Color of the highlighted scaffolds (default: "darkred").

Value

A pairs plot object.

Examples

# NOT RUN {
data(rocco)

mmplot_pairs(data = d, variables = c("C13.12.03", "C14.01.09", "C13.11.25", "gc", "PC2"), color = "essential", log = c("C13.12.03", "C14.01.09", "C13.11.25"), minlength = 10000)

# }
